entries.title: Irish tourist dies after falling from moving train in Thailand
entries.description: A 45-year-old Irish tourist died in Thailand on Tuesday after falling from a moving train, Thai police said.

entries.title: UN Security Council 'deeply alarmed' by Taliban restrictions on women
entries.description: The United Nations Security Council on Tuesday said it was "deeply alarmed" by the ruling Taliban's ban on women attending university or working for aid groups in Afghanistan.
